name: Client Name
num_joint_owners: How many joint owners are a part of the account?
canadian_or_us_acct: Is this a Canadian or U.S. dollar account?
kyc_rq_insider_9721: Is the client a 'reporting insider' for purposes of applicable securities regulations? The client may be a 'reporting insider' if he/she is a person who is a CEO, CFO, COO of the reporting issuer or major subsidiary of the reporting issuer, a significant shareholder, director of the board of the reporting issuer, or have responsibility for a principal business unit, or division of the reporting issuer whose shares trade on any Canadian exchange.
kyc_rq_ctrl_group_9721: Does the client either individually or as part of a group, own 10% or more of the voting rights of a publicly traded company?
kyc_rq_iiroc_9721: Is the client or anyone the client lives with an employee, officer, director or partner of an IIROC member firm?
kyc_rq_dealer_affiliation_9721: Is the client or anyone the client lives with an employee or a sales representative of Assante Capital Management Ltd. or its affiliates?
kyc_rq_dealer_affiliation_7646: Is the client or anyone the client lives with an employee or a sales representative of Assante Financial Management Ltd. or its affiliates?
kyc_rq_existing_acct_9721: Does the client currently have any existing accounts or are you opening multiple accounts at the present time with Assante Capital Management Ltd. or control of such accounts?
kyc_rq_existing_acct_7646: Does the client currently have any existing accounts or are you opening multiple accounts at the present time with Assante Financial Management Ltd. or control of such accounts?
kyc_rq_other_firm: Does the client have accounts with any other brokerage firms?
kyc_pefp_client: Does the client hold OR have held one of the following offices or positions in or on behalf of a foreign country: a head of state or government; a member of the executive council of government or member of a legislature; a deputy minister (or equivalent); an ambassador or an ambassador's attachÃ© or counselor; a military general (or higher rank); a president of a state-owned company or bank; a head of a government agency; a judge; or a leader or president of a political party in a legislature?
kyc_pefp_related: Is the client a spouse or common-law partner; mother or father; child; brother, sister, half brother or half sister; or spouse's or common-law partner's mother or father, of a person prescribed in the previous question?
kyc_fatca_us_citizen: Is the client a U.S. resident for tax purposes (which includes a U.S. citizen)?
kyc_fatca_snowbird: If no, and the client is a 'snowbird' or living in the U.S. temporarily, does he/she want to make an Optional Temporary U.S. Visitor Declaration?
kyc_fatca_tin: If yes, provide a U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number (SSN, EIN, ITIN)
other_persons_have: Will anyone other than the person(s) named on the account
have_trading_authority: have trading authority over the account?
have_power_of_attorney: have power of attorney over the account?
have_financial_interest: have any financial interest in the account?
details_third_party_use_case: Details to be provided in another Use Case for Third Party
account_used_by_third_party: Will this account be used on behalf of a third party?
rep_direct_interest: Does the representative have a direct or indirect interest in the account other than an interest in commissions or fees?
